J.K. Rowling, who is lending unseen manuscripts, drawings and drafts from her private archives (which will sit alongside treasures from the British Library, as well as original drafts and drawings from Jim Kay) talks about some of the personal items she has lent to the exhibition and gives new insight into her writing, looking at some of the objects from the exhibition that have fired her imagination.","poster_path":"/kkzDng2S8w2hT1gap7MdMdx7uUE.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[99],"popularity":16.467,"release_date":"2017-10-28","video":false,"vote_average":7.3,"vote_count":86},{"backdrop_path":"/qfJ6aJKRPUZ7kYOp7iuzl5jkyX5.jpg","id":2639,"title":"Deconstructing Harry","original_title":"Deconstructing Harry","overview":"Writer Harry Block draws inspiration from people he knows, and from events that happened to him, sometimes causing these people to become alienated from him as a result.","poster_path":"/i7Z5DdznqANJUjqWISEFu9bw6J7.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35,18],"popularity":16.637,"release_date":"1997-12-12","video":false,"vote_average":7.3,"vote_count":931},{"backdrop_path":"/A3FXi0fWl2q0LIK4RVSE3aH8Y09.jpg","id":11916,"title":"Two Mules for Sister Sara","original_title":"Two Mules for Sister Sara","overview":"When a wandering mercenary named Hogan rescues a nun called Sister Sara from the unwanted attentions of a band of rogues on the Mexican plains, he has no idea what he has let himself in for.
